meanings.definition: Relating to or constituting a discography.
meanings.sent1: The discographical collection of the artist showcased their entire music history.
meanings.sent2: Her discographical knowledge of the band's albums was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The discographical analysis of the songs revealed interesting patterns.
meanings.sent4: His discographical memory was like a well-organized library of music.
meanings.sent5: She had a discographical passion for cataloging vinyl records.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the recording of musical performances.
meanings.sent1: The discographical equipment used in the studio was top-notch.
meanings.sent2: His discographical skills in capturing live music were unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The discographical mishap during the concert caused a delay.
meanings.sent4: The discographical process of capturing sound was like painting with audio.
meanings.sent5: They had a discographical approach to preserving musical history.
